content: **the official pattern from bethesda game studios ** space doesn t have to be lonely meet your new friend wilby he s a wonderful project for a beginner and only requires single_crochet a color change and some light sewing to crochet your new friend wilby you will need *yarn two colors one light and one a shade darker than your light color i recommend size 6 blanket or chenille yarn for a cuddly plushie but if you want a smaller friend use a worsted weight yarn or sport weight *crochet hook i use a size 6mm hook for bulky yarn for amigurumi i use a size smaller than recommended on the yarn to make sure the stitches don t have gaps *safety eyes or extra yarn to embroider eyes *stitch markers *stuffing i use poly-fil *pins to place limbs can use stitch markers *scissors *tapestry needle to sew parts together the printable pdf can be found through the link below
